title: Gravity boots for knockups....
body:
There is no counterplay at all except spellshields for knockups. We NEED something to stop or reduce the knockup duration/height because there are becoming too many champ combo infinite knockups and it is almost impossible to counter once knocked up...

For instance, Nami bubble, kayne knockup, aatrox knockup/yasuo knockup nami/kayne/aatrox/yasuo rinse and repeat...

Just some food for thought because this is getting ridiculous when people realize it and start spamming knockup comps with AOE knockups
